mapper.select: SELECT id as id, name as name, isbn as isbn, authors as authors, available_copies as availableCopies, total_copies as totalCopies, AMOUNT as amount, CURRENCY_CODE as currencyCode, uid as bookId FROM BOOK where id = #{bookId}

SELECT uid, id, name, isbn, authors, available_copies as availableCopies, total_copies as totalCopies, AMOUNT as amount, CURRENCY_CODE FROM BOOK where ENTITY_STATUS = 0 order by available_copies desc,id desc;

SELECT b.uid as uid, b.id as id, b.name as name, b.isbn as isbn, b.authors as authors, bl.from_date as issueDate, AMOUNT as amount, CURRENCY_CODE as currencyCode FROM BOOK as b,BOOK_LENDING as bl where b.ENTITY_STATUS = 0 and bl.member = #{memberId} and bl.book = b.id and bl.thru_date is null order by bl.id desc
SELECT IFNULL(count(*),0) FROM BOOK where ENTITY_STATUS = 0

SELECT person.FIRST_NAME AS firstName, person.LAST_NAME AS lastName, person.MIDDLE_NAME AS middleName,person.DATE_OF_BIRTH AS dateOfBirth,member.id as id FROM MEMBER member LEFT OUTER JOIN PERSON person ON member.PERSON=person.ID WHERE member.ENTITY_STATUS = 0 and month(person.DATE_OF_BIRTH)= month(#{today}) and day(person.DATE_OF_BIRTH) >= day(#{today})
SELECT NAME FROM BOOK WHERE id = ( SELECT book FROM BOOK_LENDING bl,BOOK b WHERE bl.book = b.ID AND b.ENTITY_STATUS = 0 GROUP BY book ORDER BY COUNT(book) DESC LIMIT 1);

SELECT first_name as firstName ,middle_name as middleName ,last_name as lastName FROM PERSON WHERE id = ( SELECT member FROM BOOK_LENDING bl,MEMBER m WHERE bl.MEMBER = m.ID AND m.ENTITY_STATUS = 0 GROUP BY member ORDER BY COUNT(member) DESC LIMIT 1)
